name: Gin Mule
description: Whiskey and ginger is a beloved pair. Gin and ginger is also delicious — and a finer fit for summer drinking.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add simple syrup, gin and lemon juice, then top with ginger beer. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist.

video.name: Gin Mule
video.description: How to make a gin mule, which pairs gin and ginger to great effect.
